<a id="VisualShaderNodeMix"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeMix

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Linearly interpolates between two values within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translates to ``mix(a, b, weight)`` in the shader language.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpType](VisualShaderNodeMix.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeMix_OpType) **OP_TYPE_VECTOR_2D_SCALAR** = `2`

The ``a`` and ``b`` ports use a 2D vector type. The ``weight`` port uses a scalar type.<a id="VisualShaderNodeMix_constant_OP_TYPE_VECTOR_3D"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpType](VisualShaderNodeMix.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeMix_OpType) **OP_TYPE_VECTOR_3D** = `3`

[OpType](VisualShaderNodeMix.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeMix_OpType) **OP_TYPE_VECTOR_3D_SCALAR** = `4`

The ``a`` and ``b`` ports use a 3D vector type. The ``weight`` port uses a scalar type.<a id="VisualShaderNodeMix_constant_OP_TYPE_VECTOR_4D"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[OpType](VisualShaderNodeMix.md#enum_VisualShaderNodeMix_OpType) **OP_TYPE_VECTOR_4D** = `5`
